title: For His Forever
description: Twenty-two year old Nicole Masters is finally about to realize her dream of having a family.Powerful business mogul Red Jameson is with her every step of the way, taking care of his wife as they navigate the treacherous waters of East Hampton's wealthy social circles.But when a vulnerable young woman enters their lives in the most unexpected circumstances, Nicole and Red's relationship may face its greatest test yet.Soon, everything Nicole's dreamed of will be threatened by events beyond her control, and only time will tell if she truly can be his forever.
author: Kelly Favor
